10686101546.text: Spread the word - become a registered Organ Donor.  If, God forbid, anything happens to you, your last wish could save 5 other lives.

9625878510.text: Interviewing Finance Minister, Pranab Mukherjee tomorrow.Send me your Questions.

9784012228.text: Wonderful win by India's hockey team-doesnt' it make you feel really good.Hats off to Sandeep Singh.Send me msgs & I will get them to him

11243366306.text: Do you think Sachin has made up his mind not to play the T20 WC - or might his present form change is mind.  Shld we try to convince him?

10708909695.text: Now that India can question Headley (in his plea bargain he has agreed to testify in foreign cases) - that could be a major step forward.

9969772143.text: Any money you donate at the Greenathon goes to a village without electricity - to light it up with solar lighting (see ndtv.com for details)

6293041825.text: yes .. a special show on the RTI Awards coming soon (will post the exact date) with stories on how the winners solved problems using the RTI

11362113996.text: I've always said Kallis is up with the greatest. Good as Ponting, Lara (Sachin still a class apart). And he's a bowler. An all-time great.

11492677043.text: @iamsrk  I agree.  Great idea to exchange jerseys.

10934396267.text: India's access to Headley?US Attorney Gen says Yes;Headley's lawyer says Yes;plea doc says Yes;US Ambassador says NO.Who he?He shld explain

11407560565.text: @Abhishek Parashar Yes Dell's phone amazing. I saw it at Davos, Vikram Chandra did a world exclusive on it. Tell me about it's features.

11493440972.text: @kjohar25 please congratulate your wonderful team for creating a path-breaking film. Prannoy.

9667675180.text: Why did the BJP walkout of the Budget speech .... is this unprecedented ... I can't recall ever this happening before. What's the point?

9668089123.text: Beginning to look like a 'no nonsense' budget.   He's controlling government expenditure and keeping the budget deficit under control

10256778596.text: Where do you rank the Womens Reservation Bill in India's parliamentary history?  a)most significant b) top 5 bills ever c) not significant ?

11422519250.text: Camera-shy, publicity-shy owner of the Mumbai Indians, Nita Ambani, on India Decides @9. Also Praful Patel on Delhi's next airport.

8072855974.text: Are you ready for Davos? India is in many ways the focus of the world leaders there. Do foreigners think more highly of us than we do?

10827765671.text: Now a new type of cricket bat - the 'mongoose' - that hits the ball further. Is that what's needed for the game, Hayden? This isn't golf.

11245339443.text: Moments: Audience ques Richard Gere"what do you like about Indian girls?" He whispers the answer in my ear. Audience yells"what did he say"

11237787158.text: How do we get Sachin to agree to play the T20 world cup? He's playing like a 21 yr old. In terrific form.

11408657479.text: When Tiger Woods returns next week at the Augusta Masters the big question - will the crowds boo him or cheer the world's greatest golfer?

11300219987.text: You are probably right.  As they say "I report, you decide"  Don't attacks against a "tourism ambassador" seem petty & hurt the Congress?

9667006477.text: Good news .... less income tax to be paid this year ...

9682679952.text: Thank you for your questions. You can watch the interview at 8.30pm tonight on NDTV 24X7

6476429979.text: In Dubai airport - on our way to Japan. They say Dubai is dying. But the airport is bustling.   Will Dubai bounce back?

9667228634.text: The stock market seems to love this budget ... it has shot up ... the sensex went up right after the budget deficit figure was announced.

11547582837.text: Inside Ranthambore: Impressed by the honest commitment & passion of so many key ordinary people to saving the tiger. Folks, there is hope.

10686692786.text: So America does a deal with the terrorist, Headly (formerly Daood Gilani) - No extradition to India, no death sentence.  Is that fair?

11409668835.text: Just imagine, if India had the same FDI (foreign investment) as China, our growth rate would prob go up to 12% a yr. That would be awesome

11185785985.text: Moments: I ask Dalai Lama "How do you prepare for death?" Reply:"I'm working on being conscious in the last milli-sec between life & death"

10390057461.text: I just love the IPL.Great cricket.Great excitement.And so happy that Kolkatta (my home town) won the first match.Who do you support?and why?

11108657207.text: Google's Eric Schmidt works all the time. So I asked him "when do you sleep"? He said "I'll sleep when I die". But. What about practising?

11030509236.text: Save our Tiger Presser:Raised many of your issues thx (all will go to the Minister). Inc the funny one on a BT Tiger. Everyone LOL & said NO

11407800954.text: @Prakash. Thx. I may try the Google Nexus one. In what ways is it better than other phones. Worth trying - or wait for a new model?

10759139535.text: Dont you miss Pakistani cricketers in the IPL?a)they're great players b)good seeing India & Pak players hug/congratulate each other.A CBM!

11586112193.text: Ranthambore: villages in core area ARE being resettled outside. Locals say compensation=Rs10Lakhs per male, zero for women. Needs checking

10256643046.text: So one out of every three (male) MPs will lose their jobs/seats. No wonder most (male) MPs, from all parties,were fighting against the Bill

6276634604.text: The RTI revolution. Have you used the Right to Information Act? Send us examples of how it worked for you - so that others can use it too.

11268159337.text: Nobody has guessed it right ... So here goes -  Richard Gere said absolutely nothing ... that's showbiz I guess !

11030296974.text: Just interviewed A B - thanks for all your questions. He made it clear he's pushing only tourism in Gujarat, not endorsing Modi. Watch @9pm

10914232318.text: Get ready for our 'Save the Tiger Campaign - kicks off Thursday- A B is the brand ambassador. Join in pls (or our children wont see a tiger)

9679843657.text: Thank you for your questions. You can watch the interveiw at 8.30pm tonight on NDTV 24X7

11264674837.text: Somebody said to me the Congress is hurting its leader by attacking AB in her name (sources: she doesn't even know of it). Do you agree?

10699236710.text: So America does a deal with the terrorist, Headly (formerly Daood Gilani) - No extradition to India, no death sentence. Is that fair?

11023651654.text: Also @ 9pm: Exciting first sneak preview of Delhi's new airport- it will be the world's 2nd biggest airport. Will spk to Praful Patel too.

11537726926.text: OK. How many tigers yesterday ? Zilch ... And today? Wait for it ...

8154111870.text: The IPL auction was wrong and treated the Pakistani cricketers poorly - but isn't Pakistan's reaction a trifle excessive. Over the top?

11492374799.text: At Ranthambore with 12 friends. Every tiger is named: T1 to T41. Btw T16 is a local legend (want to know why?). Guess how many tigers we saw

6265323793.text: Is India a 'punishment free' society?  Smash homes, offices, cinemas - no problem.  Let me know what you think - for the 9 pm news soon.

10776745323.text: Just met the grand old man with politics in his DNA-Arjun Singh. He's writing a book-I asked, how many secrets will he leave out. He smiled

11023555659.text: also@pm: Exciting first sneak preview of Delhi's new airport. It's awesome-World's 2nd biggest. World class. Will spk to Praful Patel too.

10859408500.text: Saw LSD. Technically fascinating. Breaks traditional rules & pushes the envelope of cinema. Performances v good too. Really worth seeing.

11307746081.text: Finally a Panchayat punished for honour killings - one of the most horrible and common crimes in India. Is the death sentence OK for them?

5734657745.text: Happy to be talking to all of you from NDTV Social

11327421753.text: @Abhishek I agree with you. Virtually all our rivers in India are 'dead'.  Something must be done. And at the moment it's not irreversible.

10232928108.text: Everyone in Parliament wanted a 'debate' on the womens' bill. But I ask you - after 14 years debating it - why another debate?Just for show?

9811592551.text: Happy Holi everyone.Ready for NDTV's biggest Greenathon?Every state is doing something big.What can you do at the Greenathon(6th&7th March)?

11386570110.text: How many agree with me that the iPhone is awesome - the best phone in the market. I bet the Apple tablet will be revolutionary too. Yes?

10967802190.text: One way to save the tiger-give villages in tiger reserves 50% of receipts from their reserve.Works in other nations.Any other suggestions?

11409244385.text: Do watch Dean Jones on all NDTV 24x7 cricket shows - great fun and brilliant too. He's got some breaking news today - unreal.

11256086243.text: Hussey. What an absolutely fantaaaaastic catch. One of the best i've ever seen. Has anyone seen a better catch? But KKR :-(

10916440462.text: Google's decision to get out of China and reject censorship - brave. It'll lose a huge market. What about the other western co.s in China?

11586311616.text: Rantambore: villagers, unhappy, say they gain nothing from the sanctuary. MUST ensure they get a share (50%?) of the sanctuary's income.

10622519329.text: Oops KKR ... gave the match away after being in a strong position.  No hassle ... put it behind you.  But got to win the next match, right?

11035481196.text: Watch my exclusive interview with Amitabh Bachchan tonight @ 9pm

9667173885.text: I like the tax boost for any money spent on research ... dont you?

11137448475.text: Whenever I diet & exercise like mad my mother asks: "why do you want to live like an invalid and die healthy".  What chance do I have?

9929478901.text: Contribute to the Greenathon. Tell us one thing you will change in your life - one pledge - for the environment. We will flash them on air.

11586603487.text: Ranthambore villagers: "why should we bother about the tiger, we gain nothing from the sanctuary". Shldn't they get a share of the income?

11409528956.text: Latest: In 19 yrs India has had $127bn FDI. China gets $80bn per yr! That adds 4% to their GDP growth. Still India grows @ 8%. Pretty good.

11048958432.text: Montek: the rise in food prices is good for farmers - a one time rise after a bad monsoon. I agree,after 5 bad yrs farmers deserve a break

10934566208.text: Hayden is using that Mongoose bat again! Run out by 3 inches. Is the Mongoose bat shorter than the normal bat? 3 inches shorter? :-)

11493804767.text: Worth considering for MNIK? - Kids With Autism at the Movies: Where Shhhh Isn't Allowed : http://bit.ly/afQa7s.

9667119364.text: What do you think of the Budget so far .... has he cut back on the stimulus of the economy?

11355717091.text: @Dipk21 I'm one of you. Your taxes, my taxes - ke pharak pehnda?

10288640235.text: A recommendation-I just heard a brilliant session by Eric Schmidt, head of Google-brilliant. Watch it on Youtube (Eric Schmidt at Abu Dhabi)

11160444511.text: Just met Ajay Bijli, owner of PVR cinemas. He said LSD is doing really well at the Box Office. Great news for a film breaking ground rules

11410550005.text: @Panchajanya. Thx for the lead. I will take a look at the Roubini interview.

11245628281.text: A B says categorically to me a) I don't endorse Modi b) I'm only TOURISM brand amb Why is the whole Congress party ranged against one man?

10887294530.text: It's really easy (and very important) to become an organ donor. It will take  you 5 minutes and you could save 5 lives.  Do it today?

6339570231.text: Itu asked me: "Is consistency over-rated?"2 batsmen with same avg=50.One always scores 50;other (Sehwag-like) scores 0 and 100.Who's better?

11417206025.text: I love saying "INDIA IS THE ONLY TRUE DEMOCRACY IN GLOBAL HISTORY TO GROW AT A SUSTAINED 8%-9% PER YEAR". Makes one feel proud, right?

8246157843.text: Should India discontinue guns, marching and fighter planes at the Rep Day Parade?  Ante-deluvian & out of place in the the land of Gandhi?

10686324900.text: Gautam, great that you're considering Organ Donation - it's such a simple gift of life. Please tell others too - lets get a million donors.

10470183927.text: Way to go Kolkatta Knight Riders.Great match.Coach Dev Whatmore is already making a difference. Btw Indian players doing better in this IPL

9683114767.text: Thank you for your all for questions.

6332199425.text: OK here's an admission - I'm a cricket fanatic.  How many of you (fanatics) are with me - clearly understanding that it's the finest game?

10882106791.text: Tendulkar is awesome. Hope you're watching this electric innings. What a wonderful cricketer. You thought he's only good at test cricket?

11493636704.text: @kjohar25 worth considering for MNIK. Kids With Autism at the Movies: Where Shhhh Isn't Allowed : http://bit.ly/afQa7s

10225867174.text: Don't you feel really proud to be Indian today.The ONLY nation EVER with 33% womens' reservation. No ifs or buts today this is magnificent.

6438959764.text: Do watch NDTV's coverage of the climate change summit @ Copenhagen. We see it as perhaps the most important international event of the yr.

9667400509.text: Petrol prices to go up by at least Rs. 2 / - . Do you think this is a good thing or bad?

10882355754.text: What a catch by Ganguli, What a catch. These moments remind you that he's also a grt athlete. He was once going to be a top soccer player.

10184479798.text: An opportunity missed.India could create history & be the first country to reserve 33% of parliament for women.Come on Dr.Singh, just do it.

9925833446.text: Do watch, no...JOIN, our Greenathon- a 24 hr non-stop effort for the environment (7pm 6th-7pm,7th March). Tell us if can do something too.

11413560996.text: @Tavleen Singh. I agree & it's the huge Foreign Investment Into China yr on yr that built China's superb infrastructure. "Yes we can" too!

11546704359.text: Ranthambore:world class. Saw 4 tigers in separate sightings: 1 had a bath, 1 a dump, 2 arrogantly walked by. Each a local legend/story.

11160657968.text: Grrrreat going KKR. This was a crucial, crucial match - and you did it. Now let's keep that good old winning feeling going strong.

10994910390.text: Tonight (Thurs) on India decides @ 9 - the guests are the brilliant Montek Ahluwalia and Amitabh Bachchan.  What do you want me to ask them?

6276582688.text: something different- I was at our awards function for citizens who have used the RTI most effectively. Inspiring. True grassroots democracy

8193809485.text: I just finished a delightful conversation with SRK & KJ - Guess who Shahrukh thinks is the best actor (male or female) in Bollyood today?

11264764909.text: Lots of you seem to want to know what Richard Gere whispered in my ear. Before I tell you - let's see you guess first  :-)

8062573029.text: Interviewing Karan Johar, SRK and Kajol on Sunday. What questions should I ask them?

10994753552.text: Thank you for the suggestions pouring in on methods to save the tiger.  I shall pass them on to Jairam Ramesh. Keep the ideas coming please.

9659564971.text: Interviewing Finance Minister, Pranab Mukherjee today! Send me your Questions.

10686546112.text: Wasim, did you really think Yuvraj was arrogant - I honestly don't think he is.

9969510281.text: The Greenathon - if you have a major pledge to turn something green in your life from now on - you could get to speak to Priyanka Chopra .

11547421063.text: Legend: 17 yr old tiger called MACHLI who saved Ranthambore when it was unfairly shut dow. She'd walk out of the park to attract visitors.

10790090505.text: KKR/Ganguly-how can you lose without even trying?Run rate reqd.=14 RPO but you're trying singles? Where's the desire to win? Unforgivable.

11318244389.text: Whaaaaat? Secretaries to Govt. (& families) to get 1st Class on Air India FREE for all their lives? Your taxes for their luxury travel.
